name: SHIFT (itch) (Raghav Suriyashekar)
description:
SHIFT follows a teleporter, who has to find out the secrets to the disappearance of all his friends.

Cute animations ahead. BEWARE

PROTOTYPE

Controls:

  • AD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Ctrl - Crouch
  • Drop Portal / Teleport to portal - E
  • Teleport Mode - C

Use E to drop a portal, once dropped, you can once again use E to go back to the portal. you can only have 1 portal active at one time.

Use C (press and hold) to enter teleport mode, once in teleport mode, an afterimage will follow your mouse pointer. Left Click to spawn at mouse position or right click to spawn at a point directly below the mouse pointer on the ground below.

Enjoy and let me know what you think
